text: Sally Ralea Greengross, Baroness Greengross, OBE (n√©e Rosengarten; 29 June 1935 - 23 June 2022) was a British politician. She was honored with an OBE in the 1993 New Year's Honours. In 2000, she became a member of the House of Lords. Greengross was Director General of Age Concern England from 1987 until 2000. She also worked for King's College London."Baroness Sally Greengross" , Government Equalities Office, accessed 19 October 2011. Greengross died on 23 June 2022, one week before her 87th birthday.Baroness Greengross ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from London Category:People from Brighton
title: Sally Greengross, Baroness Greengross
